languages.text: "Мастер вокса, родственница почившего Толиман, не лучше. Не успела на пост прийти — перекрыла половину каналов связи. Мол, повреждены вокс-системы, у инженариума с другими отсеками связи нету... а мне как кораблем управлять? Силой мысли с шестеренок рапорты собирать?"

"The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"
languages.original_text: "Мастер вокса, родственница почившего Толиман, не лучше. Не успела на пост прийти — перекрыла половину каналов связи. Мол, повреждены вокс-системы, у инженариума с другими отсеками связи нету... а мне как кораблем управлять? Силой мысли с шестеренок рапорты собирать?"

traits.locale_text: "The Vox Master, relative of the deceased Toliman, is no better. Cut down half of the communication channels the day she entered the office. She says the vox systems are damaged and the enginarium has no communications with other chambers... So how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the reports from cogs with the power of my mind?"

"The Vox Master, relative of the deceased Toliman, is no better. Cut down half of the communication channels the day she entered the office. She says the vox systems are damaged and the enginarium has no communications with other chambers... So how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the reports from cogs with the power of my mind?"

"The Vox Master, relative of the deceased Toliman, is no better. Cut off half of the communication channels the day she entered the office. She says the vox systems are damaged and the enginarium has no communications with other chambers... So how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the reports from cogs with the power of my mind?"

"The Vox Master, relative of the deceased Toliman, is no better. Cut off half of the communication channels the day she entered the office. She says the vox systems are damaged and the enginarium has no communications with other chambers... So how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the reports from cogs with the power of my mind?"

"The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

"The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

"The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

languages.text: “还有那个音阵大师，托里曼家族的新人，也没好到哪儿去。她刚当上音阵大师的第一天，就把一半的音阵频道都切断了，说音阵系统被破坏了，引擎区与其他舱室失去了联系……可没有音阵系统，让我怎么开船？难道要我靠精神力量来收集技工们的报告吗？”
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

traits.locale_text: “还有那个音阵大师，托里曼家族的新人，也没好到哪儿去。她刚当上音阵大师的第一天，就把一半的音阵频道都切断了，说音阵系统被破坏了，引擎区与其他舱室失去了联系……可没有音阵系统，让我怎么开船？难道要我靠精神力量来收集技工们的报告吗？”

languages.text: «La maestra de vocos (otra Toliman como el anterior, que descanse en el vacío) es igual de mala. El día que ocupó el puesto cortó la mitad de los canales de voco. Dijo que los sistemas estaban dañados y que el ingeniarium había perdido el contacto con los otros módulos... ¿Y cómo quiere que dirija la nave? ¿Recibiendo información de los engranajes con el poder de mi mente?».
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

traits.locale_text: «La maestra de vocos (otra Toliman como el anterior, que descanse en el vacío) es igual de mala. El día que ocupó el puesto cortó la mitad de los canales de voco. Dijo que los sistemas estaban dañados y que el ingeniarium había perdido el contacto con los otros módulos... ¿Y cómo quiere que dirija la nave? ¿Recibiendo información de los engranajes con el poder de mi mente?».

languages.text: 「前任者と同じくトリマンの出身のヴォクス・マスターは――いい人材とは言えませんな。彼女は着任早々に、ヴォクス通信の半分を切断した。ヴォクス・システムが損傷し、エンジナリウムが他のモジュールとの連絡が取れなかったそうですが…それで、どうやってこの船の舵を取れと？精神論で、歩く廃品からの報告でも集めればいいってことなんですかい？」
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォクス・マスター ― 前任者と同じくトリマンの出身の ― は、いい人材とは言えませんな。彼女は着任早々に、ヴォックス・チャンネルの半分を切断した。ヴォックス・システムが損傷し、エンジナリウムが他のモジュールとの連絡が取れなかったそうですが…それで、どうやってこの船の舵を取れと？精神の力で、歯車からの報告でも集めればいいってことなんですかい？」

languages.text: "Die Voxmeisterin – auch eine Toliman, genau wie ihr Vorgänger, möge er in Frieden ruhen – ist keinen Deut besser. Sie hat die Hälfte der Voxkanäle abgeschaltet, als sie ihren Posten übernahm. Angeblich waren die Voxsysteme beschädigt und das Maschinarium hatte keinen Kontakt mit anderen Modulen ... Aber wie soll ich so das Schiff steuern? Soll ich die Berichte der Cogitatoren telepathisch einholen?"
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Voxmeisterin – auch eine Toliman, genau wie ihr Vorgänger, möge er in Frieden ruhen – ist keinen Deut besser. Sie hat die Hälfte der Voxkanäle abgeschaltet, als sie ihren Posten übernahm. Angeblich waren die Voxsysteme beschädigt und das Maschinarium hatte keinen Kontakt mit anderen Modulen ... Aber wie soll ich so das Schiff steuern? Soll ich die Berichte der Cogitatoren telepathisch einholen?"

languages.text: « La maîtresse-vox – une Toliman comme son prédécesseur, paix à son âme – ne vaut guère mieux. Elle a coupé la moitié des canaux-vox le jour où elle a pris ses fonctions en affirmant que leurs systèmes étaient endommagés et que l'enginarium n'avait plus accès aux autres modules... Expliquez-moi donc comment je suis censé piloter ce vaisseau sans eux ? En me procurant les rapports des cogs par télépathie ? »
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

traits.locale_text: « La maîtresse-vox – une Toliman comme son prédécesseur, paix à son âme – ne vaut guère mieux. Elle a coupé la moitié des canaux-vox le jour où elle a pris ses fonctions en affirmant que leurs systèmes étaient endommagés et que l'enginarium n'avait plus accès aux autres modules... Expliquez-moi donc comment je suis censé piloter ce vaisseau sans eux ? En me procurant les rapports des cogs par télépathie ? »

languages.text: "Yeni Voks Üstadı da farksız. Al birini vur ötekine yani. Uçsuz içinde yatsın, selefi gibi bu da Toliman. Göreve başlar başlamaz voks kanallarının yarısını kapattı. Neymiş Voks sistemleri hasarlıymış, mühendishanenin diğer modüllerle iletişimi yokmuş. İyi de gemiyi nasıl yönlendireceğim? Teknikçilerin raporlarını telepatiyle mi toplayayım?"
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master — another Toliman like the last one, void rest him — is no better. She cut off half the vox-channels the day she took up her post. Said the vox-systems were damaged and the enginarium had no contact with other modules... But how am I supposed to steer the ship? Collect the cogs' reports with the power of my mind?"

traits.locale_text: "Yeni Voks Üstadı da farksız. Al birini vur ötekine yani. Uçsuz içinde yatsın, selefi gibi bu da Toliman. Göreve başlar başlamaz voks kanallarının yarısını kapattı. Neymiş Voks sistemleri hasarlıymış, mühendishanenin diğer modüllerle iletişimi yokmuş. İyi de gemiyi nasıl yönlendireceğim? Teknikçilerin raporlarını telepatiyle mi toplayayım?"
